status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
MobileWeb:Platform-->JS Includes:Tapping on JS Includes gives an expected alert but is missing the last name:Smith in portrait & middle & last name:Smith in landscape.

Not a Regression, occurs with 2.0.2GA

Steps to reproduce:

Iphone 4.3.5:
1.Build kitchen sink for mobile web in titanium studio.
2.Type the ip address of your laptop into the mobile device's web browser.(safari for iphone & IE for windows phone). 
3.Hit go or enter.
4.Kitchen sink will fire up in the browser.
5.Tap on platform tab.
6.Tap on the JS Includes table row.
7.You will get an alert 'JS includes first name,middle name but is missing the last name in device portrait mode.
8.Now rotate the device into landscape orientation,you will see that we are not able to see the middle name & the last name.

Windows Mobile mango:
1.Can't scroll the page down to unhide JS Includes.Thus cant proceed forward with the test case.

Actual result:
Tapping on JS Includes gives an expected alert but is missing the last name:Smith in portrait & middle & last name:Smith in landscape.

Expected result:
1.Tapping on JS Includes gives an alert "JS Includes. 
First name: Joey 
Middle name: Waldo 
Last name: Smith"
fields.summary: MobileWeb:Platform-->JS Includes:Tapping on JS Includes gives an expected alert but is missing the last name:Smith in portrait & middle & last name:Smith in landscape.
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio : 2.1.0.201206071457
SDK Version : 2.1.0.v20120608070223
Iphone 4.3.5
Windows Phone Mango

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
